Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 5 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Environmental Guide: 1 hr adjustment allows self and 5 allies to treat environmental temperature effects as 1 step less severe
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed, suffering a -5 Survival penalty
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 8 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Hunt Prey: (1) Gives +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track a designated creature until next daily prep
Legendary Guide: Following party gains +10 Speed when traveling and can travel normally over difficult terrain and at half speed over greater difficult terrain
Monster Crafting: Can use monster bodies with Survival to craft items
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with hunted prey
Planar Survival: Can use Survival to Subsist on different planes and to prevent damage from planar conditions
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Cave): +1 Survival in Cave
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 20 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Ranger: 18 (strength; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Falchion (+8 1d10+3 S; strength; trained); Flail (+8 1d6+3 B; strength; trained); Lance (+8 1d8+3 P [Crit +d8]; strength; trained)

Unconventional Weaponry (Kukri): Weapon Familiarity (Kukri)
Hunt Prey: (1) Suffers no distance penalty for ranged Strikes in the 2nd range increment vs. a designated creature until next daily prep
Outwit: +1 Armor Class vs. hunted prey
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes

Legendary Survivalist: Can survive indefinitely without food and water and endure incredible temperatures without damage
